sense.gloss: safe, secure, sound, problem-free, without fear, all right, alright, OK, okay
no thanks, I'm good, that's alright
great man, fine figure of a man
x: 大丈夫・だいじょうふ

sense.gloss: great man, fine figure of a man
only, just, merely, simply, no more than, nothing but, alone
as much as, to the extent of, enough to
solid, firm, stout, burly, strong, sturdy
stormy and full of drama, many drastic events in the course of events, full of ups and downs, with many vicissitudes

sdata.j: ↑大丈夫↑↓だいじょうぶ↓、↑出来↑↓でき↓ますよ。
↑背丈↑↓せたけ↓はどのくらいですか。
↑君↑↓きみ↓はどのぐらいの↑背丈↑↓せたけ↓ですか。
↑急↑↓いそ↓げば↑大丈夫↑↓だいじょうぶ↓です。
sdata.e: If we hurry, we'll make it.

sdata.j: ↑気分↑↓きぶん↓は↑大丈夫↑↓だいじょうぶ↓ですか。
↑気楽↑↓きらく↓に↑行↑↓い↓こうぜ。↑大丈夫↑↓だいじょうぶ↓、↑形勢↑↓けいせい↓は↑君↑↓きみ↓に↑有利↑↓ゆうり↓なのだから。
sdata.e: Take it easy. I can assure you that chances are in your favor.

sdata.j: ↑気楽↑↓きらく↓に↑行↑↓い↓けよ。↑大丈夫↑↓だいじょうぶ↓、すべて↑上手↑↓うま↓く↑行↑↓い↓くさ。
sdata.e: Take it easy. I can assure you that everything will turn out fine.

sdata.j: ↑運動↑↓うんどう↓すればもっと↑丈夫↑↓じょうぶ↓になるよ。
sdata.e: You will be more vigorous if you exercise.

sdata.j: すべて↑大丈夫↑↓だいじょうぶ↓ですか。
↑愛↑↓あい↓さえあれば↑僕↑↓ぼく↓らは↑大丈夫↑↓だいじょうぶ↓だよ。
sdata.e: As long as we love each other, we'll be all right.

words.gloss: safe, secure, sound, problem-free, without fear, all right, alright, OK, okay
great man, fine figure of a man
